title: Null Error with Patch 6.9 - can't type in champ select
body: Since upgrading to patch 6.9, my friend and I are getting null after our summoner name in champ select. Its also not allowing us to type in the chat for champ select. Can we please have someone investigate?

replies.body:
Hi guys

Is this happening in every game, or only in some?  Can you post a screenshot of what you see when it happens?

Cheers
Mindstar
Yes, its what I Commander screenshot, we can comment in game its just during champ select. Since the new patch, its happened every game

Thanks for the info - we're looking into it at the moment.

Cheers
Mindstar
it happens in every game for me and my friend too. :(
Agent, this is happening to me too.

And me, and my brother. 

https://gyazo.com/ed5abcbb1e8dc9fce16544d5331019e7
Thats a link to a screen shot. It says the club is "null", and you cannot type a single thing into chat in champion select. 
Thanks for looking into it :P{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

> [{quoted}](name=Raab,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=uzMuJeER,comment-id=00010001,timestamp=2016-05-04T07:26:46.021+0000)
>
> Yes, its what I Commander screenshot, we can comment in game its just during champ select. Since the new patch, its happened every game

You need to have a club tag for your club - if not, the null error will occur.

Simply leave the club or create a tag for it.

Hi , 
i have also the same problem , i am not able to write in the chat , check the screenshot ( http://prntscr.com/b01va3 )
people who don't have the word "null" can type normal.
regards,

Can you tell us what the clan tag you're using in your club is?

Can you switch to using a different club's clan tag and tell me if the issue still happens? Thanks!
Can confirm that mastery emote is bugged too.
when im in a clan without a tag, it says null and wont let me type, but when i change it to something else it does let me type in champ select

I just want to report this is happening out side of champ. select to. went into a match, and after coming out, an entire hour of chat between me and some clan-mates got replaced why our summoner names followed by the word "Null" over and over again
I am also having this issue. It's my 1st game since patch.
thoose bugs, lol is becoming dota 2 or what ? :^)
but that happend to me to

Hi all,

Can you try this temp fix and let me know if it resolves the issue for you?

> [{quoted}](name=Pogba2k,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=G0wtwOpQ,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-05-04T22:44:45.787+0000)
>
> Go to View club/chat, and tick off the &quot;Show club tags&quot; and null will go away and you will be able to chat.
> Temporary fix until its fixed.

Thank you!
this worked for me. just did it and worked like a charm.

Answer:

If you are in a club without a clubtag you will receive this error.

Either leave the existing non-tagged club or simply create a tag. 

It needs to be fixed for sure, but this is really the only way of resolving the issue for now.

Can you confirm this is the solution?  Gonna try that after I get out of my game, but I was trying to switch with someone and they didn't know what I wanted so they picked a champ I don't really know how to play.
Yeah I am having the same problem, I noticed it in another game where me and this other player could not speak to team :( Please address riot
it happens to me as well.
Also happening to me
It's happening to me an my buddies too
I am having this as well. I was not able to chat in the champ select at all, it has the word "null" besides my summoner name.

Have exactly the same problem can't type in champion selection (usually i don't do it anyways, but that is still a bug) plus have the null after my name example before the game started: dino gem null after league of legends finished downloading the recent patch 6.9
same problem here
tru
This happens without a clan tag being used as well

I'm having the same issue as well. I'm in champion select and "null" shows up after my summoners name, and I am unable to speak to anyone in chat. Not a terribly huge issue for me, but it's still a glitch that needs to be resolved.
Same thing is happening to me, I was just in a game where another guy in my lobby had it too
This has been very very common. Every game I have played today me and at least one other person cannot chat and have the null add-on.
I have the same problem. says null after my summoner name and can't write in champ selection. maybe incomplete group tag?

Yes, I have got the same problem.
Don't know how to fix it..
I too am getting this same issue.
Having this same issue as well.

I am having the same issue.

Link:

[IMG]http://i66.tinypic.com/vpjorq.png[/IMG]
I hv the same problem i canT write in chat and  had the letters 'null' after it , sry my bad englisch

Bump. 
I got the same problem.
I have the exactly same things, all the games its happening and I cannot type at all. please fix{{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}
Same problem here. My name is "ApocalipsisRoja null" and I can't type in the chat. Happening since the new update (6.9).
I'm having the same issue,  null after summoner name and can't chat in champ select.

I also had this problem. I had created a club but had no tag set. By unchecking "show club tags" in club settings I was then able to talk in the pre-game lobby. It fixed it instantly when I made the change in a lobby.
I have this problem as well RIGHT now.
Exactly the same problem, but also cant use my mastery emote in game.

We had the same issue, just leave the club you're in for now until the fix.

That solves the NULL issue until there is a solution from Riot. :)
I fixed by turning off club tag in settings for club.
happening on NA Server as well. i too can not type in game nor can i use mastery or control 6, also says null next to my name
Same here in all games since the client patched.
I have the same problem too , in 2 Games already.
